title: Sore Ike! Anpanman: Hashire! Wakuwaku Anpanman Grand Prix
synopsis: The Anpanman Grand Prix is a land, air and sea race around Anpanman World using specially built cars. A grumpy young girl from Flower Land called Maggie causes an accident that wrecks Creampandaâ€™s race car. After helping him fix it, she enters the race as his partner.
